content.text: Can you please create a lab for running multiple instances of ocodex, that spawn based on either a blueprint/playbook, a prompt, a cli prompt cmd, etc, so that ocodex can utilize multiple instances to talk to itself and create an orchestrated effort in achieving the greater goal, a playbook or prompt could be in the form of an ansible playbook, puppet, chef, Saltstack, Terraform, etc the tool will be decided by the ocodex orchestrator and then delegated based on needs, goals, task lists, etc, before creating the entire project, please Create a highly detailed comprehensive Outline of what this project must accomplish so that it can be viewed in the repo.
